title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2015 - St. Gallen, Switzerland
description:
It's the first time, we are running GDCR in St. Gallen! 
Our hosts, as per tradition in Zurich, is the friendliest and coolest IT shop in town: Namics AG (http://www.namics.com/namics/standorte/zuerich/). 
Registration is open here - http://42talents.com/gdcr-sg 
Also, check out the GDCR events in Bern and Zürich as well, you may need to travel less!
